main.description: Get records that link out to both a primary and secondary subject

subject.description: the primary target being linked to (at-uri, did, or uri)

source.description: collection and path specification for the primary link (e.g., 'app.bsky.feed.like:subject.uri')

pathToOther.description: path to the secondary link in the many-to-many record (e.g., 'otherThing.uri')

linkDid.description: filter linking records from specific users

otherSubject.description: filter secondary links to specific subjects

linkRecord.description: reference to the link record itself

otherSubject.description: the secondary subject from the link record

linkRecord.description: A record identifier consisting of a DID, collection, and record key

did.description: the DID of the linking record's repository

collection.description: the collection of the linking record
